about.about_hero_text_1_3: , a firm of developers on demand aiming to provide custom-made solutions for every business need. Our services range from consultancy and analytics to software development.
about.about_hero_text_2: Our main goal is to help our customers’ businesses grow by understanding their challenges as if they were our own.

about_values_cards.title: Mission
about_values_cards.text: To provide customized solutions to Colombian companies that seek digital transformation. We do this through a dynamic framework that allows us to face the challenges of the current market.

about_values_cards.title: Vision
about_values_cards.text: By 2026, we will be a leading provider of digital solutions in Latin America, expanding our services to contribute to and promote open and collaborative development in the tech community.

about_values_cards.title: Philosophy
about_values_cards.text: Not only do we create added value for the end-user, our clients, and associates, but also for society in general, committed to offering products that exceed expectations.

about_values_elements.title: Ingenuity
about_values_elements.text: We constantly innovate with candidness and creativity, always finding the most efficient solution.

about_values_elements.title: Trust
about_values_elements.text: We strongly believe in our ability to work autonomously and efficiently.

about_values_elements.title: Transparency
about_values_elements.text: We communicate ideas assertively, always based on fair and accurate assessments.

about_values_elements.title: Teamwork
about_values_elements.text: We always work with the common good in mind because we believe that we can accomplish more together.

about_history.title: Chronicle of an announced takeoff
about_history.subtitle: Flying over our history

beginning_history.title: The beginning of everything
beginning_history.paragraph_1: In a discussion regarding the BPO business in 2019, our founders came to an important conclusion: in Colombia, this growing market was not only bringing more jobs but also opening great opportunities for other industries.
beginning_history.paragraph_2: Thus, Pidgin was born. We were a company that focused on covering specific BPO needs, such as analytics, reporting, and databases, through the provision of developers.
beginning_history.paragraph_3: In 2020, the COVID19 pandemic forced us to close our doors before we could begin operations with our largest clients. Nonetheless, we didn't give up and continued fighting for this dream.
beginning_history.paragraph_4: We learned, during 2020, that because of the emerging job modalities, more and more sectors were in dire need of developers. The developers that were needed were not just ordinary type but, in fact, the best developers the market could offer. During these difficult times, we saw many businesses transform. More importantly, we saw them grow,
beginning_history.paragraph_4_highlighted: which ignited within us a burning desire to grow along with them.

incubation_history.title: Incubation
incubation_history.paragraph_1: In 2021 we renewed our brand and our services. Our mission then became to connect the best developers with the best companies.
incubation_history.paragraph_2: We transformed our approach to show businesses that have not yet dared to venture into the digital transformation that evolving with the best technology is possible.
incubation_history.paragraph_3: So, with a new roadmap planned out,
incubation_history.paragraph_3_highlighted: all that was left was to put together a team of people who shared our values and wanted to fly high with us.

pidgin_history.title: Pidgin > Phoenix
pidgin_history.paragraph_1: In 2022 we returned and initiated operations with one of our largest clients. Our Pigeons also joined us to help build and expand the company in three main areas: Administration, Sales and Marketing, and Operations.
pidgin_history.paragraph_2: We went from being two dreamers talking about the great opportunities that the BPO market offered, to being an active firm that provides development services. Our services are directed not only at those large companies that have brought progress but also at those which are just starting, companies which, like us, dream of becoming giants in their own industries.

about_history.text: We are currently active on social media, and we are beginning to make our way into the world of development and startups.
about_history.text_highlighted: We continue moving forward, working as a team to keep on transforming people's lives via the wonderful ideas that our developers can bring about and make possible.

about_members.title: The faces of the
about_members.text: Our co-founders have 15 years of combined experience in the development and big-data sector, and they have carefully selected the talents that make up the team through a process that is both agile and rigorous.

members.name: Nicole Mora
members.paragraph_1: I am a woman with a passion for learning. I learn so that I can teach and motivate others. Having been a teacher, this comes naturally to me. I came to Pidgin looking to spread that passion to others. We aim to become one of the leading firms in the field of technology to offer solutions to our clients that allow them to grow and, at the same time, have the best service experience possible.
members.paragraph_2: Knowing that we have an exceptional team to make this dream a reality is very fulfilling. I believe that relationships in a company should always be reciprocal. When you work hard for your team, wonderful things are achieved. Thus, the greatest challenge for me in this company is to honor and meet all my Pigeons' expectations and needs so that, as a team, we can help make all of our customers’ dreams a reality.

members.name: Camilo Ospina
members.paragraph_1: I am an Administrator of developing companies from the Gran Colombiano Polytechnic University, I have 5 years of experience in the public and private sectors, developing administrative issues for different companies. I also have knowledge in personnel management and in the development of processes for the improvement of activities in the required areas.
members.paragraph_2: I have led teams in customer service and I am characterized by good teamwork, which is why I consider myself a leader who goes hand in hand with the objectives and ideals of the company. I am part of the administrative team which will be a key piece for the company to keep the administrative and personnel processes in order, working like clockwork in the delivery and provision of services to our Pigeons.

members.name: Lenin Dorado
members.paragraph_1: I am a professional in Commercial Business Administration from the Universidad Colegio Mayor de Cundinamarca, with a diploma in business coaching, I have more than 4 years of experience in startups, I led several work teams in the commercial and customer service area. I characterize myself as a born leader because I always seek to develop the potential of the people I work with and thus achieve goals. As Henry Ford already said. “Arriving together is the beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success”, I love reading, outdoor sports and spending quality time with my family.
members.paragraph_2: I enjoy working with the Pigeons. I am part of the sales team; an amazing group of professionals and one of the most energetic and dynamic sales departments I have ever been a part of. The benefits are excellent and we enjoy a unique culture of candor.
